Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

Hello! How can I assist you today?
I'm here to help with whatever you need! Let me know your question, and I'll do my best to assist you right away.

I'm sorry to hear that your payment failed. We recommend contacting your bank to resolve the payment issue or adding a different payment method. If you update your account with a new payment method, don't forget to resubmit your ads! You can also add ad credits to your account as a short-term solution. For more details, you can check out our Billing Guide here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide).

Got it! If you've already tried those steps and are still experiencing issues, please email our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com for further assistance. They'll be able to help you resolve the issue.
